verbose_text: We also observed upregulation of GLI1, GLI2, and GLI3 expression levels in FOXA2 KO cells at the pancreatic progenitor stages (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), suggesting that FOXA2 negatively regulates Shh signaling during pancreatic differentiation.
evidence: KO cells at the pancreatic progenitor stages ( XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY ), suggesting that FOXA2 negatively regulates Shh
